page.title: 16ASHPERTON - NEW BUILDING
page.content: Over the past 150 years there were only eight houses built in the village until in the early 1970s when the County Planning Authority decided that they would allow housing development on the east side of the main road. Land down Church Lane and around the Church was bought by builders in single plots and two larger sites which eventually gave the village a development of eighteen houses. Together with two half timbered houses which have been completely renovated these are the homes of most of the people newly_arrived in the village.
